author: jgm
content: Don't hold out your how for any EIP to save you, anything that is proposed will have to assume you have control of the withdrawal address, so a hacker could change the credentials ahead of you. As mentioned, working with a rescue group is the best option.

author: buthe3000
content: Yes but i don't know where to find those.
